localised_description: Skeletal Steeds draped in fine armour make for an impressive and dangerous sight.
To me, my winged steed of bone and flesh; let us fly and remake the world together!
The unholy combination of warp-tech, cathayan engineering and absolute insanity has created an unstable instrument of death.
Skeletal Steeds draped in fine armour make for an impressive and dangerous sight.
To me, my winged steed of bone and flesh; let us fly and remake the world together!
